mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn ,t.* from (select room_code,room_typename,room_state from tb_room t,tb_roomtype p where t.room_typeid=p.room_typeid order by room_state,room_code) t where rownum < #{end}) a where a.rn > #{start}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_room(room_code,room_typeid,room_state) values(#{room_code},(select room_typeid from tb_roomtype where room_typename=#{room_typename}),#{room_state})
mapper.select: select room_code,room_typename from tb_room a,tb_roomtype b where a.room_typeid=b.room_typeid and room_code=#{room_code}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_room_part values(#{room_code},#{name},#{phone},#{card},(select room_typeid from tb_roomtype where room_typename=#{room_typename}),#{indate},0,tb_room_part_id.nextval,#{outdate})
mapper.update: update tb_room set room_state=2 where room_code=#{room_code}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_room_part values(#{room_code},#{name},#{phone},#{card},(select room_typeid from tb_room where room_code=#{room_code}),#{indate},0,tb_room_part_id.nextval,#{outdate})
